|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = Bluetooth 4.1 |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/25/2015 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :WLAN 2x2 802.11ac 2.4/5GHz + Bluetooth 4.1 *'''Lite-On WCBN808B''' • BCM94350ZAE_2 :WCBN808B • [[Dell]] PN: CN-0VW3T3 :WCBN808B-D1(US) • [[Dell]] PN: 08PKF4 :WCBN808B-L6 • [[Lenovo]] FRU: 00JT493 This module would appear to be using an NGFF (M.2) interface. :BCM94350Z (2230, key E), BCM94350ZAE (2230, key A+E) *[[Broadcom BCM94350ZAE]] - [14e4:43a3] (NGFF 2230, key A+E) [PCIe/SDIO 3.0] :[[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless-connectivity/wireless-lan/bcm4350 BCM4350] (802.11a/b/g/n/ac + BT 4.1 LE, 2x2, 2.4/5GHz) • [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s768605 PR] 
BCM4350_D11AC_ID	0x43a3		4350 802.11ac dualband
BCM4350_D11AC2G_ID	0x43a4		4350 802.11ac 2.4G device
BCM4350_D11AC5G_ID	0x43a5		4350 802.11ac 5G device
:Linux driver: [[Brcmfmac]] [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcm80211] (4.4+) :Windows driver: [http://listing.driveragent.com/c/pci/14e4/43a3/ Win8 14e4:43a3] *[[Dell Wireless 1820A (DW1820A)]] - Broadcom BCM4350C5 (BT 4.1) :[0a5c:6412] - [[Dell]] Wireless 1820A (Bluetooth 4.1 LE USB) :[0a5c:6413] - [[Broadcom]] BCM4350C5 (Generic) :[0a5c:6414] - [[Broadcom]] BCM4350C5 ([[Lenovo]]) *[[Dell]]: '''Lite-On WCBN808B''' BCM94350ZAE_2 - OUI: AC:E0:10, C8:FF:28 *[[Lenovo]]: [[Foxconn T77H649.00]] BCM94350ZAE_2 - OUI: 70:77:81 ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://osxlatitude.com/forums/topic/11322-dw1820a-broadcom-bcm4350-chipset-under-high-sierramojave Broadcom BCM4350 cards under High Sierra/Mojave @ '''OSXlatitude'''] :[[Dell Wireless 1820A (DW1820A)]] • CN-0VW3T3 [14e4:43a3/[[1028]]:0021] :[[Foxconn T77H649.00]] • [[Lenovo]] FRU: 00JT494 [14e4:43a3/[[17aa]]:075a] :Lite-On WCBN808B-L6 • [[Lenovo]] FRU: 00JT493 • [[Dell]] PN: CN-0VW3T3 *[https://forums.opensuse.org/showthread.php/507933-openSUSE-on-the-2015-Apple-12-Inch-Retina-MacBook ''Broadcom BCM94350'' card on '''opensuse.org''' forums] :Apple MacBook 12" (Retina, 2015) [14e4:43a3/[[106b]]:0131] *[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/pub?key=0Arr23WYNror4dHNPbUVyakY5THExY0tNbU5hR2xaR1E&gid=1 Compatibility table for NGFF modules (with photo) @ '''Skvo'''] :*[http://www.tonymacx86.com/network/104850-guide-airport-pcie-half-mini-v2-76.html List of PCIe / NGFF devices @ '''tonymacx86'''] :*[http://portal.nca.org.gh/search_type_approval_view_details.php?typeApproveDetailID=743 ''Broadcom BCM94350ZAE'' on '''NCA'''] ==See also== *[[Lite-On WCBN802A]] *[[Lite-On WCBN802B]] *[[Lite-On WCBN803A]] *[[Lite-On WCBN804A]] *[[Lite-On WCBN806A]] *[[Lite-On WCBN807A]] *[[Lite-On WCBN807B]] *[[Lite-On WCBN808A]] *Lite-On WCBN808B [[Category:English Documentation]]
